005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.type;
007
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.StaticContext;
009import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.IItem;
010import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.node.IAssemblyNodeItem;
011import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.node.IDocumentNodeItem;
012import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.node.IFieldNodeItem;
013import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.node.IFlagNodeItem;
014import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.node.IModuleNodeItem;
015import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.node.INodeItem;
016import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.type.impl.AnyFunctionItemType;
017import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.type.impl.AnyItemType;
018import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.type.impl.AnyKindTest;
019import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.type.impl.ArrayTestImpl;
020import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.type.impl.KindAssemblyTestImpl;
021import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.type.impl.KindDocumentTestImpl;
022import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.type.impl.KindFieldTestImpl;
023import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.type.impl.KindFlagTestImpl;
024import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.type.impl.MapTestImpl;
025import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.type.impl.TypeConstants;
026import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.qname.IEnhancedQName;
027
028import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
029import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.Nullable;
030
031/**
032 * Provides type information that be used to discover type information for,
033 * test, and cast various item objects.
034 * <p>
035 * A variety of static methods are provided that can be used to generate tests
036 * that compare an item's actual type against an expectation.
037 */
038public interface IItemType {
039  /**
040   * Get a new kind test that matches any item.
041   *
042   * @return the test
043   */
044  @NonNull
045  static IItemType item() {
046    return AnyItemType.instance();
047  }
048
049  /**
050   * Get a new kind test that matches any function item.
051   *
052   * @return the function test
053   */
054  @NonNull
055  static IItemType function() {
056    return AnyFunctionItemType.ANY_FUNCTION;
057  }
058
059  // static IFunctionTest function(@NonNull ISequenceType result, @NonNull
060  // ISequenceType... args) {
061  //
062  // }
063
064  /**
065   * Get a new kind test that matches any map item.
066   *
067   * @return the map test
068   */
069  @NonNull
070  static IItemType map() {
071    return AnyFunctionItemType.ANY_MAP;
072  }
073
074  /**
075   * Get a new kind test that matches any map item whose keys and values match the
076   * provided atomic type and sequence type respectively.
077   *
078   * @param key
079   *          the expected atomic type of the map's key
080   * @param value
081   *          the sequence test to use to check the map's contents
082   *
083   * @return the map test
084   */
085  @NonNull
086  static IMapTest map(@NonNull IAtomicOrUnionType<?> key, @NonNull ISequenceType value) {
087    return new MapTestImpl(key, value);
088  }
089
090  /**
091   * Get a new kind test that matches any array item whose values match the
092   * provided sequence.
093   *
094   * @return the array test
095   */
096  @NonNull
097  static IItemType array() {
098    return AnyFunctionItemType.ANY_ARRAY;
099  }
100
101  /**
102   * Get a new kind test that matches any array item whose values match the
103   * provided sequence.
104   *
105   * @param value
106   *          the sequence test to use to check the array's contents
107   *
108   * @return the array test
109   */
110  @NonNull
111  static IItemType array(@NonNull ISequenceType value) {
112    return new ArrayTestImpl(value);
113  }
114
115  /**
116   * Get a new kind test that matches any atomic valued item.
117   *
118   * @return the atomic type test
119   */
120  @NonNull
121  static IAtomicOrUnionType<?> anyAtomic() {
122    return TypeConstants.ANY_ATOMIC_TYPE;
123  }
124
125  /**
126   * Get a new kind test that matches any {@link INodeItem}.
127   *
128   * @return the node kind test
129   */
130  @NonNull
131  static IKindTest<INodeItem> node() {
132    return AnyKindTest.ANY_NODE;
133  }
134
135  /**
136   * Get a new kind test that matches any Metaschema {@link IModuleNodeItem}.
137   *
138   * @return the module kind test
139   */
140  @NonNull
141  static IKindTest<IModuleNodeItem> module() {
142    return AnyKindTest.ANY_MODULE;
143  }
144
145  /**
146   * Get a new kind test that matches any {@link IDocumentNodeItem}.
147   *
148   * @param test
149   *          the root node test
150   * @return the document kind test
151   */
152  @NonNull
153  static IKindTest<IDocumentNodeItem> document() {
154    return AnyKindTest.ANY_DOCUMENT;
155  }
156
157  /**
158   * Get a new kind test that that matches an {@link IDocumentNodeItem} that has a
159   * root node of the provided kind.
160   *
161   * @param test
162   *          the root node test
163   * @return the document kind test
164   */
165  @NonNull
166  static IKindTest<IDocumentNodeItem> document(@NonNull IKindTest<IAssemblyNodeItem> test) {
167    return new KindDocumentTestImpl(test);
168  }
169
170  /**
171   * Matches any {@link IAssemblyNodeItem} regardless of its name or type.
172   *
173   * @return the test
174   */
175  @NonNull
176  static IKindTest<IAssemblyNodeItem> assembly() {
177    return AnyKindTest.ANY_ASSEMBLY;
178  }
179
180  /**
181   * Get a new kind test that matches a {@link IAssemblyNodeItem} with the
182   * provided name and a type matching the provided name of a specific assembly
183   * definition.
184   * <p>
185   * If used as part of a document kind test, the the provided
186   * {@code instanceName} will match the root assembly name of the document's
187   * root.
188   *
189   * @param instanceName
190   *          the name of the assembly root definition or instance to match
191   *          depending on the use context
192   * @param typeName
193   *          the name of the assembly definition to match
194   * @param staticContext
195   *          the static context in which the test was declared
196   * @return the test
197   */
198  @NonNull
199  static IKindTest<IAssemblyNodeItem> assembly(
200      @NonNull IEnhancedQName instanceName,
201      @Nullable String typeName,
202      @NonNull StaticContext staticContext) {
203    return new KindAssemblyTestImpl(instanceName, typeName, staticContext);
204  }
205
206  /**
207   * Get a new kind test that matches an {@link IAssemblyNodeItem} with any name
208   * and a type matching the provided name of a specific assembly definition.
209   *
210   * @param typeName
211   *          the name of the assembly definition to match
212   * @param staticContext
213   *          the static context in which the test was declared
214   * @return the test
215   */
216  @NonNull
217  static IKindTest<IAssemblyNodeItem> assembly(
218      @NonNull String typeName,
219      @NonNull StaticContext staticContext) {
220    return new KindAssemblyTestImpl(null, typeName, staticContext);
221  }
222
223  /**
224   * Matches any {@link IFieldNodeItem} regardless of its name or type.
225   *
226   * @return the test
227   */
228  @NonNull
229  static IKindTest<IFieldNodeItem> field() {
230    return AnyKindTest.ANY_FIELD;
231  }
232
233  /**
234   * Matches any {@link IFieldNodeItem} with the provided name and a type matching
235   * the provided name of a specific field definition.
236   *
237   * @param instanceName
238   *          the name of the field instance to match depending on the use context
239   * @param typeName
240   *          the name of the field definition to match
241   * @param staticContext
242   *          the static context in which the test was declared
243   * @return the test
244   */
245  @NonNull
246  static IKindTest<IFieldNodeItem> field(
247      @NonNull IEnhancedQName instanceName,
248      @Nullable String typeName,
249      @NonNull StaticContext staticContext) {
250    return new KindFieldTestImpl(instanceName, typeName, staticContext);
251  }
252
253  /**
254   * Matches any {@link IFieldNodeItem} with a name and type matching the provided
255   * name of a specific field definition.
256   *
257   * @param typeName
258   *          the name of the field definition to match
259   * @param staticContext
260   *          the static context in which the test was declared
261   * @return the test
262   */
263  @NonNull
264  static IKindTest<IFieldNodeItem> field(@NonNull String typeName, @NonNull StaticContext staticContext) {
265    return new KindFieldTestImpl(null, typeName, staticContext);
266  }
267
268  /**
269   * Matches any {@link IFlagNodeItem} regardless of its name or type.
270   *
271   * @return the test
272   */
273  @NonNull
274  static IKindTest<IFlagNodeItem> flag() {
275    return AnyKindTest.ANY_FLAG;
276  }
277
278  /**
279   * Matches any {@link IFlagNodeItem} with the provided name and type matching
280   * the provided name of a specific globally-scoped flag definition.
281   *
282   * @param instanceName
283   *          the name of the flag instance to match
284   * @param typeName
285   *          the name of the flag definition or value type to match
286   * @param staticContext
287   *          the static context in which the test was declared
288   * @return the test
289   */
290  @NonNull
291  static IKindTest<IFlagNodeItem> flag(
292      @NonNull IEnhancedQName instanceName,
293      @Nullable String typeName,
294      @NonNull StaticContext staticContext) {
295    return new KindFlagTestImpl(instanceName, typeName, staticContext);
296  }
297
298  /**
299   * Matches any {@link IFlagNodeItem} with any name and type matching the
300   * provided name of a specific globally-scoped flag definition.
301   *
302   * @param typeName
303   *          the name of the globally-scoped flag definition to match
304   * @param staticContext
305   *          the static context in which the test was declared
306   * @return the test
307   */
308  @NonNull
309  static IKindTest<IFlagNodeItem> flag(@NonNull String typeName, @NonNull StaticContext staticContext) {
310    return new KindFlagTestImpl(null, typeName, staticContext);
311  }
312
313  /**
314   * Test if the provided item matches this item type.
315   *
316   * @param item
317   *          the item to test
318   * @return {@code true} if the item matches the expectations or {@code false}
319   *         otherwise
320   */
321  default boolean isInstance(IItem item) {
322    return getItemClass().isInstance(item);
323  }
324
325  /**
326   * Get the item Java class associated with this item type.
327   *
328   * @return the item Java class
329   */
330  @NonNull
331  Class<? extends IItem> getItemClass();
332
333  /**
334   * Get the human-readable signature of the item type.
335   *
336   * @return the signature
337   */
338  @NonNull
339  String toSignature();
340}
